# ch-grid-settings-columns

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The `ch-tabular-grid-settings-columns` component represents the settings for a grid's columns.

## Properties

| Property               | Attribute | Description                            | Type                               | Default     |
| ---------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `columns` _(required)_ | --        | An array of column elements to render. | `HTMLChTabularGridColumnElement[]` | `undefined` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part             | Description |
| ---------------- | ----------- |
| `"column"`       |             |
| `"column-label"` |             |


## Dependencies

### Used by

 - [ch-tabular-grid](../..)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  ch-tabular-grid --> ch-tabular-grid-settings-columns
  style ch-tabular-grid-settings-columns fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
